meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Erin McCready Glenn Fleishman Meredith Lowmaster Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6459.

td.p: Erin McCready, a teaching artist from Brooklyn, New York
Glenn Fleishman, a technology journalist from Seattle, Washington
Meredith Lowmaster, a medical research technician from Quincy, Massachusetts (whose 1-day cash winnings total $16,000)

tr.td: THE TROPIC OF CAPRICORN
CELEBRITY COOKBOOKS
IT'S ALWAYS "I", "I", "I"
(Alex: As a matter of fact, each response will contain three "I"s.)
TV NETWORK NAMES
ESCAPIST LITERATURE
WORN UNDERNEATH
